scripts.dev: concurrently -n shared,api,web -c cyan,magenta,yellow "pnpm --dir packages/shared run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/api run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/web run dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @roadtrip/shared build && pnpm --filter @roadtrip/api build && pnpm --filter @roadtrip/web build
scripts.lint: pnpm -r --bail run lint && pnpm exec prettier --check "packages/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md}"
